name: Nuclear Knight - Battle of the Towers.
name_original: Nuclear Knight - Battle of the Towers.
description:
Epic battle, base defense game.

Save your home base and attack enemy tower.
Create new battle units. Upgrade your tower and beat enemy units.
When you feel what enemy is strong, use super weapon for smash down enemy's warriors.

Your feel what it is very easy? Try more hard levels.

Become the master of war.
